Architecture: amd64 arm64 armel ia64 m68k mips64el mipsel ppc64el riscv64 all
Build-Depends: cmake (>= 3.10), mpi-default-bin, mpi-default-dev, bc, procps, debhelper-compat (= 12), libcjson-dev, libfmt-dev, quilt, dh-python, pkg-config, lsb-release, libtool, doxygen, graphviz, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, ghostscript, libboost-system-dev, libboost-test-dev, zlib1g-dev, python3-dev, libpython3-dev, python3-numpy, python3-distutils, python3-setuptools, python3-setuptools-scm, python3-pytest-runner, python3-decorator, libdune-common-dev, pybind11-dev
Package-List: libopm-common deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64 libopm-common-bin deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64 libopm-common-dev deb libdevel optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64 libopm-common-doc deb doc optional arch=all python3-opm-common deb python optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64
